description: The application dont make it possible to read from external media. This is only a problem in the flathub version and is the same in all xnxxx-apps. Download from the homepage instead (https://www.xnview.com)
summary: Cant read or see external media

description: Seems fairly fast to apply filters and worked without any issues. Only thing I was able to make it do wrong was, tried to close the program while exporting a file and the file ended up corrupt. (however I would consider that user error, don't close the program until the file is saved LOL)
Das Programm macht was es soll, genau wie die App für Android. Simpel aber superb!
